    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    GuiMainMysql
    Main entry point for the MySQL-based Movie Manager DMS application (Phase 4).
    Movie
    Represents a movie entity in the Movie Manager DMS.
    MovieDao
    Data Access Object (DAO) interface for the Movie entity.
    MovieFormDialog
    Modal dialog window used for creating or editing a Movie record.
    MovieService
    Service layer that coordinates validation and orchestration between the GUI and the DAO layer.
    MovieTableFrameMysql
    Main Swing window for the MySQL-backed Movie Manager DMS.
    MysqlMovieDao
    MySQL implementation of MovieDao using plain JDBC.
